segments.text: There is a new coffee shop opening up down the street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope that they have a good menu . Most coffee shops only have coffee and Danish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . You don't drink coffee , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , so it's usually boring to join my friends in the afternoon at a regular coffee shop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of things would you like to see on the menu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe a fruit salad and a few different hot sandwiches at least .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That shouldn't be too difficult . Since this is a small neighborhood , maybe they will take this suggestion .
segments.speaker: S1
